location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Foreign Department, Government of India, Simla to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding difficulties with the Mayo College and a conflict over the proposed arrangements with the Military Department rules regarding salary for the College Principal.The letter also discusses Captain Ashton Mills Brandreth of the Civil Engineers who has been recommended for the appointment.
